title: Start
body:
Welcome to this test

[[Shortcut test|ShortcutTest]]
[[Conditional test|ConditionalTest]]
[[Sound test|SoundTest]]
[[Exit|Exit]]

title: ShortcutTest
body:
Shortcut tests

->Shortcut option 1
    This is option one

->Shortcut option 2
    ->multiple options!
        Awesome
    ->Option two
        Cool
    ->Option three
        Feh

[[Start]]

title: ConditionalTest
body:
Conditional test

testVal is currently:
<<type $testVal>>

-> Add <<if $testVal <= 100>>
    <<set $testVal = $testVal + 1>>
    Added 1
-> Subtract <<if $testVal > 0>>
    <<set $testVal = $testVal - 1>>
    Subtracted 1
-> Back
    [[Start]]


[[ConditionalTest]]

title: SoundTest
body:
Sound Tests

->Play sound
    Playing sound...
    <<sound Explosion1>>

[[Start]]
